src:
EXO releases a sneak peek of their dance practice for #Obsession + Chanyeol bites Chen's butt
06 Nov 2019, 18:59 by Kkkpopvvv



EXO's comeback is getting near and the countdown on EXO's website has only a few hours left but fans got an interesting and shocking surprise from EXOs twitter account.
The posted video shows EXO preparing for their comeback and Chanyeol biting Chen's butt(and the choreographer's as well). This made many fans laugh as people could not hide their reactions and feelings after seeing the funny video. See it down below and share your reaction.
